description:
Paquet Builder is a mix between an installer software and an advanced Self-Extracting 7z (7zip archive) tool.  Create compact and fully-customized Windows installer packages and Self-extracting archives for professional file and software delivery.
	
	Paquet Builder supports the following features:

* Compress your files and software into compact installer packages
* Customize behavior and look of your installers and packages
* Have total control over behavior and functionality of installers and SFX packages
* Protect your installers and ensure integrity of their contents
* Create multilanguage distributions and Self-Extracting packages
* Batch Build and Automation Support
* Easily design your packages and installers
summary: Paquet Builder is a mix between an installer software and an advanced Self-Extracting 7z (7zip archive) tool.  Create compact and fully-customized Windows installer packages and Self-extracting archives for professional file and software delivery.
author: G.D.G. Software
